ns0:entry.ns0:title: IBM/mcp-context-forge
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/IBM/mcp-context-forge
Language: python
A Model Context Protocol (MCP) Gateway & Registry. Serves as a central management point for tools, resources, and prompts that can be accessed by MCP-compatible LLM applications. Converts REST API endpoints to MCP, composes virtual MCP servers with added security and observability, and converts between protocols (stdio, SSE, Streamable HTTP).

ns0:entry.ns0:title: MODSetter/SurfSense
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/MODSetter/SurfSense
Language: python
Open Source Alternative to NotebookLM / Perplexity, connected to external sources such as Search Engines, Slack, Linear, Jira, ClickUp, Confluence, Notion, YouTube, GitHub, Discord and more. Join our discord: https://discord.gg/ejRNvftDp9

ns0:entry.ns0:title: OpenPipe/ART
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/OpenPipe/ART
Language: python
Agent Reinforcement Trainer: train multi-step agents for real-world tasks using GRPO. Give your agents on-the-job training. Reinforcement learning for Qwen2.5, Qwen3, Llama, and more!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ansible/ansible
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ansible/ansible
Language: python
Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your applications and systems easier to deploy and maintain. Automate everything from code deployment to network configuration to cloud management, in a language that approaches plain English, using SSH, with no agents to install on remote systems. https://docs.ansible.com.
